00016 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00017 {
00018         std::string warn_message("Parameter <%s> Not Set. Using Default Value <%s>");
00019         ros::init(argc, argv, "Occupancy_Generator");
00020         ros::NodeHandle nh;
00021         ros::Publisher pub = nh.advertise<oryx_path_planning::OccupancyGridMsg>("oryx/occupancy_point_cloud_topic", 2);
00022         ros::Publisher s_pub = nh.advertise<oryx_msgs::SoftwareStop>("oryx/software_stop", 2);
00023 
00024         //x dimension of occupancy grid
00025         std::string p_x_dim("occupancy/x_dimension");
00026         double x_dim = 20;
00027         std::string x_dim_msg("");

00029         x_dim_msg+="m";

00032         std::string p_y_dim("occupancy/y_dimension");

00045         //resolution occupancy grid
00046         std::string p_res("occupancy/grid_resolution");
00047         double res = .25;
00048         std::string p_res_msg("");
00049         p_res_msg+= boost::lexical_cast<double>(res);
00050         p_res_msg+="m";
00051 
00052         if(!nh.getParam(p_x_dim,        x_dim))                 PARAM_WARN(p_x_dim,             x_dim_msg);
00053         if(!nh.getParam(p_y_dim,        y_dim))                 PARAM_WARN(p_y_dim,             y_dim_msg);
00054         if(!nh.getParam(p_z_dim,        z_dim))                 PARAM_WARN(p_z_dim,             z_dim_msg);
00055         if(!nh.getParam(p_res,          res))                   PARAM_WARN(p_res,               p_res_msg);
00056 
00057         oryx_path_planning::Point origin;
00058         origin.x = 0;
00059         origin.y = y_dim/2;
00060         origin.z = 0;
00061 
00062         bool stop = true;
00063         while(ros::ok())
00064         {
00065                 oryx_path_planning::OccupancyGrid grid(x_dim, y_dim, res, origin, oryx_path_planning::FREE_LOW_COST);
00066                 oryx_path_planning::PointCloud line_cloud;
00067                 oryx_path_planning::Point start_point;
00068                 start_point.z=0;
00069                 start_point.rgba = oryx_path_planning::OBSTACLE;
00070                 oryx_path_planning::Point end_point;
00071                 end_point.z=0;
00072                 end_point.rgba = oryx_path_planning::OBSTACLE;
00073 
00074                 oryx_path_planning::Point goal_point;
00075 
00076                 ROS_INFO("Enter X0: ");
00077                 std::cin >> start_point.x;
00078                 start_point.x=std::floor(start_point.x);
00079                 ROS_INFO("I Got Input!: %f", start_point.x);
00080                 ROS_INFO("Enter Y0: ");
00081                 std::cin >> start_point.y;
00082                 start_point.y=std::floor(start_point.y);
00083                 ROS_INFO("I Got Input!: %f", start_point.y);
00084 
00085                 ROS_INFO("Enter Xf: ");
00086                 std::cin >> end_point.x;
00087                 end_point.x=std::floor(end_point.x);
00088                 ROS_INFO("I Got Input!: %f", end_point.x);
00089                 ROS_INFO("Enter Yf: ");
00090                 std::cin >> end_point.y;
00091                 end_point.y=std::floor(end_point.y);
00092                 ROS_INFO("I Got Input!: %f", end_point.y);
00093 
00094                 ROS_INFO("Enter Goal X: ");
00095                 std::cin >> goal_point.x;
00096                 goal_point.x=std::floor(goal_point.x);
00097                 ROS_INFO("I Got Input!: %f", end_point.x);
00098                 ROS_INFO("Enter Goal Y: ");
00099                 std::cin >> goal_point.y;
00100                 goal_point.y=std::floor(goal_point.y);
00101                 ROS_INFO("I Got Input!: %f", end_point.y);
00102 
00103                 goal_point.z = 0;
00104 
00105                 start_point.getVector4fMap();
00106                 end_point.getVector4fMap();
00107 
00108                 oryx_path_planning::castLine(start_point, end_point, oryx_path_planning::OBSTACLE, line_cloud);
00109 
00110                 for(oryx_path_planning::PointCloud::iterator line_itr = line_cloud.begin(); line_itr<line_cloud.end(); line_itr++)
00111                 {
00112                         PRINT_POINT("Line Point", (*line_itr));
00113                         grid.setPointTrait(*line_itr, (oryx_path_planning::PointTrait)line_itr->rgba);
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 ROS_INFO("I'm Sending Occupancy Grid:\n%s", grid.toString(0,0)->c_str());
00117                 try
00118                 {
00119                         grid.setGoalPoint(goal_point);
00120                 }
00121                 catch(std::runtime_error& e)
00122                 {
00123                         ROS_WARN_STREAM(e.what());
00124                 }
00125                 oryx_path_planning::OccupancyGridMsg message;
00126                 message.header.frame_id = "base_link";
00127                 grid.generateMessage(message);
00128                 pub.publish(message);
00129         }
00130 }
